name: Adventure Ocean
description:
CONTROLS:
Move with W, A, S & D
Interact/ talk with Space

This game is aimed at children so please do not expect to find it challenging or complex.

I made this game for my end of year project during my first year of college. Because of this, I had to finish the game in a limited time frame and I didn't have time to do the art for the last mini-game.

In-spite of this I hope you enjoy and feel free to leave feedback.
